text: Here is a very easy made Christmas tree from paper and garland. You'll need to spend around 1 hour to make this Christmas project!
It doesn't matter that we must spend 1 hour, all that matters is that the little Christmas tree is adorable.  Thank you for the idea.  <3

I know you have to start them now to get ready for Christmas, I have started my gifts of homemade crafts also. Was the little white thing styrofoam? I have never seen them that shape. Can you make snowman out of recycled things? Haven’t found any I like.thanks
Great idea. What did you do with the aluminum foil and tissue for?
Really cute, are the white balls styrofoam? And I know it’s a Christmas video but PLEASE IT IS TO EARLY FOR CHRISTMAS CAROLS!
Bonsoir , c'est une belle idée . Merci et bonne soirée.
Your Christmas trees are so pretty. You have a wonderful day.
Прекрасная идея - нежная ёлочка и яркие мандарины! Сразу чувствуется Новый год! Классно!
